titles.title: I will bless Thee oh lord

comments.comment:
verse 1(we will bless..) verse 1 ( i will bless...)
[above are Song Tags with notes imported from EasyWorship]

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
With our hands lifted up
And our mouths filled with praise
With a heart of thanksgiving
We will bless Thee oh Lord

We will bless Thee oh Lord

And my mouth filled with praise
With a heart of thanksgiving
I will bless Thee oh Lord
